title: NASA makes progress on space sustainability strategy
summary: Three months after unveiling a new space sustainability strategy, NASA’s deputy administrator says the agency is making good progress on implementing key aspects of it.

title: Italian Startup FAST Secures €500K for Air-Launched HyperDart Rocket
summary: FAST Aerospace has secured a €500,000 “Proof of Concept investment” to begin the development of a prototype of the ramjet engine that will power its carrier aircraft. Officially incorporated in March 2024, FAST is developing an air-launched rocket system called HyperDart. The system is designed to be capable of delivering 250-kilogram payloads to low Earth […]

title: NASA Cloud-Based Platform Could Help Streamline, Improve Air Traffic
summary: Just like your smartphone navigation app can instantly analyze information from many sources to suggest the best route to follow, a NASA-developed resource is now making data available to help the aviation industry do the same thing. To assist air traffic managers in keeping airplanes moving efficiently through the skies, information about weather, potential delays, […]

title: Starlink satellites lost on Falcon 9 upper stage failure
summary: SpaceX says it will not be able to recover the 20 Starlink satellites left in a very low orbit after a malfunction of a Falcon 9 upper stage on a July 11 launch.

title: SpaceX Falcon 9 Grounded, FAA Requires Public Safety Investigation Following Starlink Mission Failure

title: Sols 4241–4242: We Can’t Go Around It…We’ve Got To Go Through It!
summary: Earth planning date: Wednesday, July 10, 2024 Curiosity is currently trekking across Gediz Vallis channel because, as my nephew’s favorite book says, if we can’t go around it… we’ve got to go through it! title: NASA to Commemorate 55th Anniversary of Apollo 11 Moon Landing
summary: As the agency explores more of the Moon than ever before under the Artemis campaign, NASA will celebrate the 55th anniversary of the first astronauts landing on the Moon through a variety of in-person, virtual, and engagement activities nationwide between Monday, July 15, and Thursday, July 25. title: SpaceX launch anomaly occurs on Falcon 9 Starlink satellite mission
summary: SpaceX’s launch of a Falcon 9 rocket on Thursday night was set to send 20 Starlink high-speed internet satellites into low-Earth orbit....
